ooassignment3.vehicleclasses

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ooassignment3.vehicleclasses.Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accessory, AstonMartinDB9, FordEscort, McLarenF1, SeatIbiza

    public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is the parent class of all concrete class representations of specific cars/vehicles.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double cost
      The cost of the vehicle.
      protected FuelTypeInterface fuelType
      The type of fuel/engine the vehicle uses.
      protected GearBox gearBox
      The type of gearbox the vehicle has.
      protected java.lang.String make
      The vehicle's make.
      protected java.lang.String model
      The vehicle's model.
      protected int mpg
      The vehicle's miles per gallon.

      Vehicle's default constructor.
      Vehicle(java.lang.String make, java.lang.String model)
      This constructor creates the car and sets the make and model.

      • calculateMPG

        public int calculateMPG()
        Calculates the MPG. If the car has its fuel/engine type set, the MPG will be the base MPG + the adjustment amount from the fuel type. Otherwise it just be the base MPG.
        Returns:
        the MPG of this car.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • calculateCost

        public double calculateCost()
        Calculates the cost of the vehicle. If the car has its fuel/engine type set, the cost will be the base price * the discount associated with that fuel/engine type. Otherwise it just be the base cost.
        Returns:
        The calculated cost of the vehicle
